text: Hello guys, I have a problem with a newsletter, I have a module for a featured article, everything works fine, but when I don't have a topic added, the article is displayed above the main table
another question :disappointed: I have a topic slug, which is working on the blog, on the newsletter is not, all the links are working
how can I add the main domain to it?
btw, let me know if this is the right channel to ask this kind of questions

If I have a blog loop that is 3 posts across per row, how would I add a class to just the first item (posts: 1,4,7,10,13,16,etc..) in each row? I was able to the the last class by simply using `divisible by 3` but the first one has me stumped
is there a way to do this with HUBL?
